startScreen:
^Text Adventure Game
^Brandon Ramirez

^Controls
<go	-> move in a direction
<take	-> pick up an item
<look	-> interact with objects
<i	-> view your inventory
<help	-> view controls
helpScreen:
^Basic Controls
<go	-> move to a different room
<i	-> view inventory
<take	-> pick up an item
<look	-> inspect a feature closely
